title: It’s My Time Now!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Here, drink some tea. Let’s take a little break. You must be tired, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh? Not at all. Maru had a lot of fun playing with those three.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I can’t believe how fast they got attached to you.... Did you have any babysitting experience?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hmm.... Well, sometimes Maru would do a paper play for the little kids at my family’s temple....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I see~. No wonder you’re so good with them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe, really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>But now you have to deal with me, Hanamaru! We’ll be doing the legendary school idol DVD marathon! I’ve prepared lots of snacks and drinks!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Oooh.... you even got lightsticks!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>We can’t start without some lightsticks, after all~! Let’s gooo~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeaaah~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
